timeline.bodyText: Could you please kindly explain the magic number 2000 means? I check the JDK7 Constant value, 2000 is refer to JAVA_OBJECT, not DECIMAL, am I right?
timeline.author: hit-lacus

replies.bodyText: Looks like it is presto's specific behaviour of mapping DECIMAL to JAVA_OBJECT.
replies.author: hit-lacus

timeline.bodyText: Should we start the ID from 84 other than 92?
timeline.author: hit-lacus
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -170,6 +170,34 @@
     <FUNCTION_DEF ID="82" EXPRESSION="CORR($0, $1)"/>
     <!--Random number-->
     <FUNCTION_DEF ID="83" EXPRESSION="RAND()"/>
+    <!--RAND_INTEGER-->
+    <FUNCTION_DEF ID="92" EXPRESSION="RAND_INTEGER($0, $1)"/>

timeline.bodyText: The name of PushDownRunnerOtherImpl is not well defined. Since it is the the advanced version of elder PushDownRunnerJdbcImpl, and reuse some logic in Data Source SDK. Maybe we change is name to something like PushDownRunnerJdbcAdvancedImpl? What do you think @shaofengshi ?
timeline.author: hit-lacus
